verses.name: Judges 14:5
verses.text: Then went Samson down, and his father and his mother, to Timnath, and came to the vineyards of Timnath: and, behold, a young lion roared against him.

verses.name: Judges 14:6
verses.text: And the Spirit of the Lord came mightily upon him, and he rent him as he would have rent a kid, and he had nothing in his hand: but he told not his father or his mother what he had done.

verses.name: Judges 14:7
verses.text: And he went down, and talked with the woman; and she pleased Samson well.
